entry.title: Dell is not serious about Linux

content.div: How serious Dell is about Linux? I think it is not that serious, and it is using Ubuntu fans as free advertising platformadvertising platform continue reading...

Last week I participated in a Windows 7 course. I was sent to the course by my employer, although in my official role is Linux System Engineer. 9 people attended the course. Looking around my colleagues I had some interesting observations, I'd like to share. continue reading...

entry.title: UEFI Secure booting is good for Linux

content.div: Microsoft will block non Windows on the ARM platform. Big deal. It is if installing Linux on any other Laptop is easy. Sure you can install Linux on most Laptops today. But does it really work? continue reading...

entry.title: Linux users - stop whining about UEFI Secure booting!

content.div: Sorry for the provocative title, but I think Linux and other FOSS Operating System should really stop whining about the UEFI secure booting. continue reading...
